Test.Name: SpareTotal more than 0 in the first Recording, Video type
Test.Description: SpareTotal>0 in the first recording. Type of new track should be Video

Test.Name: SpareTotal more than 0 in the first Recording, Audio type
Test.Description: SpareTotal>0 in the last recording. Type of new track should be Audio

Test.Name: SpareTotal more than 0 in the first Recording, Metadata type
Test.Description: SpareTotal>0 in the last recording. Type of new track should be Metadata

Test.Name: SpareTotal more than 0 in the last Recording
Test.Description: SpareTotal>0 in the last recording. Type of new track should be Video

Test.Name: All recordings have SpareTotal=0 (1)
Test.Description: DUT returns all recordings with SpareTotal=0. Spare Total of the first recording becomes more than 0 after track deletion in this recording.

Test.Name: All recordings have SpareTotal=0 (2)
Test.Description: DUT returns all recordings with SpareTotal=0. Spare Total of the last recording becomes more than 0 after track deletion in the last recording.

Test.Name: All recordings have SpareTotal=0: failed case
Test.Description: DUT returns all recordings with SpareTotal=0. Spare Total of all recordings stay equal to 0 after track deletion.

Test.Name: All recordings with SpareTotal=0 and no tracks
Test.Description: DUT returns all recordings with SpareTotal=0 and without atracks.

Test.Name: Delete track: cannot delete fault
Test.Description: DUT returns SOAP fault (Action/CannotDelete) message to DeleteTrack request

Test.Name: All tracks cannot be deleted
Test.Description: DUT returns SOAP fault (Action/CannotDelete) message to all DeleteTrack requests

Test.Name: Delete track: general fault
Test.Description: DUT returns SOAP fault message to DeleteTrack request

Test.Name: Delete track: no trsponse
Test.Description: DUT returns no response to DeleteTrack request

Test.Name: SpareTotal>0 and all Spare<Type>=0
Test.Description: SpareTotal>0 in the first recording. Spare<Type>=0 for this recording.

Test.Name: All Spare<Type> > 0
Test.Description: SpareTotal>0 in the first recording. All Spare<Type> > 0 for this recording.

Test.Name: Empty recording list: GetServices
Test.Description: DUT returns empty recording list, DUT supports GetServices

Test.Name: Empty recording list: GetCapabilities
Test.Description:
!!!Resresh features with this faile before test!!!
DUT returns empty recording list, DUT doesn't support GetServices

Test.Name: Empty recording list: dynamic recording is false
Test.Description: DUT returns empty recording list, DynamicRecordings="false"

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-3-1-7 DYNAMIC TRACKS CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check for DynamicRecordings capability Can't create recording because DynamicRecordings isn't supported STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Created recording has no tracks
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: Empty recording list after recording creation
Test.Description: DUT returns empty recording list, DUT sends correct response to CreateRecording request DUT returns empty recording list after recording creation

Test.Name: Fault to CreateRecording request
Test.Description: DUT returns empty recording list, DUT sends fault to CreateRecording request

Test.Name: No response to CreateRecording request
Test.Description: DUT returns empty recording list, DUT sends no response to CreateRecording request

Test.Name: Fault to GetRecordingOptions request
No response to GetRecordingOptions request
Incorrect GetRecordingOptions response
Test.Description: GetRecordingOptions response message is not correspond to schema: no RecordingOptions.Track element

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-3-1-7 DYNAMIC TRACKS CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recording Options (token = 'RecordingToken2') Transmit done Receive done The element 'Options' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/recording/wsdl' has incomplete content. List of possible elements expected: 'Track' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/recording/wsdl'. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Incorrect GetRecordingOptions response: negative Spare value
Test.Description: GetRecordingOptions response message is not correspond to schema: RecordingOptions.Track element has attrribute with negative value

Test.Name: Description of created track differs from requested
Test.Description: Recording in updated list (after track creation) has description differs from reqested

Test.Name: Type of cteated track differs from requested
Test.Description: Recording in updated list (after track creation) has type differs from reqested (Video instead of Audio)

Test.Name: Tracktoken is not unique: passed case
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when track token is unique within tested recording. Traks within different recordings have the same TrackToken

Test.Name: Tracktoken is not unique within tested recording
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when track token is not unique (within tested recording) in CreateTrackResponse

Test.Name: Track is not presented after creation
Test.Description: Check DYNAMIC TRACK CONFIGURATION test when track is not presented after creation

Test.Name: There is no tested recording after track creation
Test.Description: Recording in updated list (after track creation) is not presented

Test.Name: Other tracks in tested recording are changed after track creation
Test.Description: DUT sends Recording list after track creation procedure where old tracks of tested recording deffer from initial recording list

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-3-1-7 DYNAMIC TRACKS CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recording Options (token = 'RecordingToken2') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Create track Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that new track (token = TrackToken2) wasn't presented in recording (token = RecordingToken2) STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that new track (token = TrackToken2) is presented in recording (token = RecordingToken2) STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check that configuration parameters of new track are valid STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Check that track list wasn't changed Track Types of track with token 'TrackToken1' are different STEP FAILED
Restoring the initial settings...
STEP 12 - Delete track 'TrackToken2' from recording 'RecordingToken2' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
